import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './CSS/Homepage.css' import Product from './Product' import Sidepanel from './Sidepanel' const Homepage = () => { const gender = useSelector(state => state.productFilter.gender) const genderArray = useSelector(state => state.productFilter.genderArray) return (
Shirts for {gender.gender}
{genderArray.length}Items
) } export default Homepage
